abilities.name: Fast Feet
abilities.effect: Dodrio can retreat even when it is Asleep or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Dodrio.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Dodrio can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.
